0.text: Innate - Resonance: Ekko's basic attacks  on-hit and damaging abilities apply a stack of Resonance to enemies hit for 4 seconds, refreshing on subsequent hits and stacking up to 3 times. The third stack consumes them all to deal 30 − 140 (based on level) (+ 90% AP) bonus magic damage. Z-Drive Resonance deals 300% damage against  monsters.
0.html: Innate - Resonance: Ekko's basic attacks on-hit and damaging abilities apply a stack of Resonance to enemies hit for 4 seconds, refreshing on subsequent hits and stacking up to 3 times. The third stack consumes them all to deal 30 − 140 (based on level) (+ 90% AP) bonus magic damage. Z-Drive Resonance deals 300% damage against monsters.
markedPassages: on-hit
monsters

1.text: Resonance cannot affect the same target more than once every few seconds.
1.html: Resonance cannot affect the same target more than once every few seconds.

2.text: Innate - Stolen Time: Triggering Resonance against a  champion grants Ekko 50 / 60 / 70 / 80% (based on level)  bonus movement speed for 2 / 2.5 / 3 (based on level) seconds.
2.html: Innate - Stolen Time: Triggering Resonance against a champion grants Ekko 50 / 60 / 70 / 80% (based on level)  bonus movement speed for 2 / 2.5 / 3 (based on level) seconds.
markedPassages: champion
bonus movement speed

0.text: Active: Ekko throws a temporal grenade in the target direction that deals magic damage to enemies hit.
0.html: Active: Ekko throws a temporal grenade in the target direction that deals magic damage to enemies hit.

1.text: At 700 units or upon hitting an enemy  champion, the grenade slows down for 1.75 seconds to gradually expand into a Temporal Sickness field that  slows nearby enemies, travelling for another 190 units.
1.html: At 700 units or upon hitting an enemy champion, the grenade slows down for 1.75 seconds to gradually expand into a Temporal Sickness field that slows nearby enemies, travelling for another 190 units.
markedPassages: champion
slows

2.text: Afterwards, the grenade contracts and homes back to Ekko at an increased speed, dealing magic damage to enemies hit.
2.html: Afterwards, the grenade contracts and homes back to Ekko at an increased speed, dealing magic damage to enemies hit.

3.text: Enemies can be hit only once per pass.
3.html: Enemies can be hit only once per pass.
possibleConcerningAbilities: Enemies can be hit only once per pass.

0.text: Passive: Ekko's basic attacks deal bonus magic damage equal to 3% (+ 3% per 100 AP) of the target's missing health against enemies below  30% of their maximum health. The damage has a minimum threshold of 15 and is capped at 150 against  minions and  monsters.
0.html: Passive: Ekko's basic attacks deal bonus magic damage equal to 3% (+ 3% per 100 AP) of the target's missing health against enemies below  30% of their maximum health. The damage has a minimum threshold of 15 and is capped at 150 against minions and monsters.

minions
monsters

1.text: Active: Ekko creates an afterimage of himself that, after 2 seconds, bats a device to the target location and grants  sight of the area for 2.5 seconds. After travelling over 1.25 seconds, the device expands into a chronosphere for 1.5 seconds that  slows enemies within by 40%.
1.html: Active: Ekko creates an afterimage of himself that, after 2 seconds, bats a device to the target location and grants sight of the area for 2.5 seconds. After travelling over 1.25 seconds, the device expands into a chronosphere for 1.5 seconds that slows enemies within by 40%.
markedPassages: sight
slows

2.text: If Ekko enters the sphere, it detonates to grant him a  shield for 2 seconds and  stun enemies within for 2.25 seconds.
2.html: If Ekko enters the sphere, it detonates to grant him a shield for 2 seconds and stun enemies within for 2.25 seconds.

stun

0.text: Active: Ekko  dashes in the target direction, then empowers his next basic attack within 3 seconds to have a 0.25-second cast time, gain  300 bonus range, cause him to  blink within 125 range of the target, and deal bonus magic damage.

0.text: Passive: Upon learning Chronobreak or if its current cooldown is lower than 4 seconds, Ekko reveals a time-delayed afterimage of himself that constantly tracks where he was 4 seconds ago.
0.html: Passive: Upon learning Chronobreak or if its current cooldown is lower than 4 seconds, Ekko reveals a time-delayed afterimage of himself that constantly tracks where he was 4 seconds ago.

1.text: Active: Ekko enters  stasis at the start of the cast time, and afterwards  heals himself and  dashes to his afterimage's current location over 0.5 seconds. Upon arrival, the stasis ends and he creates an explosion that deals magic damage to nearby enemies.
1.html: Active: Ekko enters stasis at the start of the cast time, and afterwards heals himself and dashes to his afterimage's current location over 0.5 seconds. Upon arrival, the stasis ends and he creates an explosion that deals magic damage to nearby enemies.

1.concerningText: Active: Ekko throws a temporal grenade in the target direction that deals magic damage to enemies hit.

At 700 units or upon hitting an enemy  champion, the grenade slows down for 1.75 seconds to gradually expand into a Temporal Sickness field that  slows nearby enemies, travelling for another 190 units.
Afterwards, the grenade contracts and homes back to Ekko at an increased speed, dealing magic damage to enemies hit.

active.originHTML:
Active

Unique – Supersonic: Dash 125 to 275 units in the target direction, though not through terrain, unleashing an arc of 7 rockets in the same direction that deal 125 (+ 15% AP) magic damage to enemies hit. Afterwards, gain 30% bonus movement speed while facing nearby enemy champions for 1.5 seconds (40 second cooldown).
Supersonic resets the user's basic attack timer.
active.originText:
UNIQUE – SUPERSONIC:  Dash 125 to 275 units in the target direction, though not through terrain, unleashing an arc of 7 rockets in the same direction that deal 125 (+ 15% AP) magic damage to enemies hit. Afterwards, gain 30% bonus movement speed while facing nearby enemy champions for 1.5 seconds (40 second cooldown).
Supersonic resets the user's basic attack timer.

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Mythic Passive: Empowers each of your other Legendary items with 5 magic penetration.
passive.originText: MYTHIC PASSIVE: Empowers each of your other Legendary items with 5 magic penetration.
